verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%>. When the LORD <S%H3068><s%> turned again <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7870><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, we were like them that dream <S%H2492><s%>.

Then was our mouth <S%H6310><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with laughter <S%H7814><s%>, and our tongue <S%H3956><s%> with singing <S%H7440><s%>: then said <S%H559><s%> they among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1431><s%> for them.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1431><s%> for us; whereof we are glad <S%H8056><s%>.
Turn again <S%H7725><s%> our captivity <S%H7622><s%> <S%H7622><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, as the streams <S%H650><s%> in the south <S%H5045><s%>.
They that sow <S%H2232><s%> in tears <S%H1832><s%> shall reap <S%H7114><s%> in joy <S%H7440><s%>.

He that goeth <S%H3212><s%> forth <S%H1980><s%> and weepeth <S%H1058><s%>, bearing <S%H5375><s%> precious <S%H4901><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, shall doubtless <S%H935><s%> come <S%H935><s%> again with rejoicing <S%H7440><s%>, bringing <S%H5375><s%> his sheaves <S%H485><s%> with him.
